LightningComponentBundle.description: The component is custom Related List

property.name: pNoteObjectApiName
property.label: Child Object API name
property.description: Enter the API name of the child object.

property.name: pRelatedListTitle
property.label: Related List Title
property.description: The title of the related list to be displayed.

property.name: pNotesRelatedList
property.label: Related List ID
property.description: Plural label of Child (Append '__r' if needed).

property.name: pNotesFields
property.label: List Columns
property.description: Provide API names of the fields in the child object (comma separated).

property.name: showNewButton
property.label: Allow users to create records
property.description: Enable to show the New button on the related list

property.name: pDefaultSortedBy
property.label: Sorted By (Default)
property.description: Provide the API name of the field in the child object, to sort the list by default.

property.name: pFilterText
property.label: Filter Criteria (GraphQL syntax)
property.description: The filter to apply to the related list records, in GraphQL syntax.

property.name: pPageSize
property.label: Page Size
property.description: Number of records to load in each request.
